sqls.sql: SELECT T5.ID, T5.APPLICATION_NO, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.STATUS, T5.HCI_CODE, T5.HCI_NAME, T5.SUBMIT_DT FROM (SELECT T1.ID, T1.APPLICATION_NO, T1.APP_TYPE, T1.STATUS, T3.HCI_CODE, T3.HCI_NAME, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME, T3.POSTAL_CODE FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 <#if applicationNo_list??> and ${applicationNo_list} </#if> ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if application_no??> and T5.APPLICATION_NO = :application_no</#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if sub_date??> and T5.SUBMIT_DT >= :sub_date</#if> <#if blk_no??> and charindex(:blk_no, T5.BLK_NO) >0 </#if> <#if floor_no??> and charindex(:floor_no, T5.FLOOR_NO) >0 </#if> <#if unit_no??> and charindex(:unit_no, T5.UNIT_NO) >0 </#if> <#if street_name??> and charindex(:street_name, T5.STREET_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if building_name??> and charindex(:building_name, T5.BUILDING_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if postal_code??> and charindex(:postal_code, T5.POSTAL_CODE) >0 </#if>

sql.remarks: Inspector Leader / Inspector Assign Task For Inspector

sqls.sql: SELECT T5.ID, T5.APPLICATION_NO, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.SERVICE_ID, T5.STATUS, T5.HCI_CODE, T5.HCI_NAME, T5.SUBMIT_DT, T5.IS_PRE_INSPECTION FROM (SELECT T1.ID, T1.APPLICATION_NO, T1.APP_TYPE, T1.STATUS, T1.SERVICE_ID, T3.HCI_CODE, T3.HCI_NAME, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T4.IS_PRE_INSPECTION, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME, T3.POSTAL_CODE FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID WHERE 1 = 1 <#if applicationNo_list??> and ${applicationNo_list} </#if> ) T5 WHERE 1 = 1 <#if application_no??> and T5.APPLICATION_NO = :application_no</#if> <#if appNo_list??> and ${appNo_list} </#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and T5.STATUS = :application_status</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if blk_no??> and charindex(:blk_no, T5.BLK_NO) >0 </#if> <#if floor_no??> and charindex(:floor_no, T5.FLOOR_NO) >0 </#if> <#if unit_no??> and charindex(:unit_no, T5.UNIT_NO) >0 </#if> <#if street_name??> and charindex(:street_name, T5.STREET_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if building_name??> and charindex(:building_name, T5.BUILDING_NAME) >0 </#if> <#if postal_code??> and charindex(:postal_code, T5.POSTAL_CODE) >0 </#if>

select item.id as ITEM_ID, regulation.CLAUSE_NO as CLAUSE_NO, regulation.clause as CLAUSE, item.question AS CHECKLISTITEM, item.answer_type as ANSWER_TYPE, item.risk_level as RISK_LEVEL, item.status as STATUS from chkl_config_hcsa_svc_item_pool item, chkl_config_hcsa_svc_regulation regulation where 1 = 1 and item.regulation_id = regulation.id and item.status = 'CMSTAT001' <#if itemId??> and charindex(:itemId, item.id) >0</#if> <#if regulationClauseNo??> and charindex(:regulationClauseNo, regulation.clause_no) >0 </#if> <#if regulationClause??> and charindex(:regulationClause, regulation.clause) >0 </#if> <#if checklistItem??> and charindex(:checklistitem, item.question) >0</#if> <#if answerType??> and item.answer_type = :answerType</#if> <#if riskLevel??> and item.risk_level = :riskLevel</#if> <#if status??> and item.status = :status</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T5.GROUP_NO, T5.APP_TYPE, T5.SUBMIT_DT, T5.PMT_STATUS, T5.cou, T5.ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T4.GROUP_NO, T4.APP_TYPE, T4.SUBMIT_DT, T4.PMT_STATUS,T4.ID,T6.cou,T2.ID as corrid,T1.APPLICATION_NO,T1.STATUS,T3.HCI_CODE,T3.HCI_NAME, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID JOIN (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT application.APPLICATION_NO) COU, APP_GRP_ID FROM application GROUP BY app_grp_id) as T6 ON T4.ID = T6.app_grp_id where T1.STATUS not in ('APST009','APST045') ) T5 JOIN taskView T7 ON T7.ref_No = T5.corrid WHERE (T7.task_status = 'TSTATUS001' or T7.task_status = 'TSTATUS002') <#if userId??> and T7.user_id = :userId </#if> <#if roleId??> and T7.role_id = :roleId </#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0</#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and T5.STATUS IN ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if hci_address??> and charindex(:hci_address, T5.address) >0</#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0</#if>

SELECT DISTINCT T5.APPLICATION_ID,T5.APPLICATION_NO, T5.SERVICE_ID, T5.LICENCE_ID, T5.STATUS, T5.HCI_CODE, T5.ID,T5.address,T5.VERSION,T5.HCI_NAME, T5.BLK_NO, T5.FLOOR_NO, T5.UNIT_NO, T5.STREET_NAME, T5.BUILDING_NAME, T5.POSTAL_CODE, T5.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID, T5.APP_TYPE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T1.ID APPLICATION_ID,T1.APPLICATION_NO,T1.SERVICE_ID, T1.ORIGIN_LICENCE_ID LICENCE_ID, T1.STATUS,T1.VERSION, T3.HCI_CODE,T2.ID,T4.GROUP_NO,T1.APP_TYPE,T3.HCI_NAME,T4.SUBMIT_DT, T3.BLK_NO, T3.FLOOR_NO, T3.UNIT_NO, T3.STREET_NAME, T3.BUILDING_NAME, T3.POSTAL_CODE,T2.ID as corrid, CONCAT(T3.BLK_NO , case T3.STREET_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.STREET_NAME end , case T3.BUILDING_NAME when null then null when '' then null else ' '+T3.BUILDING_NAME end , case T3.FLOOR_NO when null then null when '' then null else ' # '+T3.FLOOR_NO end , case T3.UNIT_NO when null then null when '' then null else '-'+T3.UNIT_NO end , case T3.POSTAL_CODE when null then null when '' then null else ', '+T3.POSTAL_CODE end ) AS address FROM APPLICATION T1 JOIN APP_PREMISES_CORRELATION T2 ON T2.APPLICATION_ID = T1.ID JOIN APP_GRP_PREMISES T3 ON T3.ID = T2.APP_GRP_PREM_ID JOIN APPLICATION_GROUP T4 ON T4.ID = T1.APP_GRP_ID where T1.STATUS not in ('APST009','APST045') ) T5 JOIN taskView T7 ON T7.ref_No = T5.corrid WHERE (T7.task_status = 'TSTATUS001' or T7.task_status = 'TSTATUS002') <#if userId??> and T7.user_id = :userId </#if> <#if roleId??> and T7.role_id = :roleId </#if> <#if groupNo??> and T5.GROUP_NO = :groupNo</#if> <#if groupNoIn??> and ${groupNoIn}</#if> <#if application_no??> and charindex(:application_no, T5.APPLICATION_NO) >0</#if> <#if application_type??> and T5.APP_TYPE = :application_type</#if> <#if application_status??> and T5.STATUS IN ${application_status}</#if> <#if hci_code??> and charindex(:hci_code, T5.HCI_CODE) >0 </#if> <#if sub_date??> and T5.SUBMIT_DT >= :sub_date</#if> <#if hci_address??> and charindex(:hci_address, T5.address) >0</#if> <#if hci_name??> and charindex(:hci_name, T5.HCI_NAME) >0</#if>
